name: Cajun Style Stuffed Peppers
author: Heidi Slonka
summary: A Cajun twist on a classic rice stuffed green pepper - andouille sausage, shrimp, and Creole seasoning.
ingredients: ¾ pound shrimp, peeled and deveined
1 ½  links of andouille sausage, diced
1  lemon - cut into wedges, for garnish  (Optional)
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Bring a large pot of  water to a boil
Remove tops and seeds from peppers
Heat olive oil in a large, deep skillet over medium heat
Stir in garlic, and season with oregano, Creole seasoning and black pepper
Stir in shrimp and sausage, and cook until shrimp turns pink, 5 minutes
Stir in rice, and cook 1 minute
Pour in chicken broth and tomato sauce
Fill peppers with stuffing mixture, and place in baking dish
Bake in preheated oven for 15 to 20 minutes, or until heated through
Serve with lemon wedges and hot sauce
